name: The Slowest Gun in the West
name_original: The Slowest Gun in the West
description:
Cowboy Hazmat Man is stuck within a factory full of Baddies. Good news: he has a gun! Bad news: it's the slowest gun in the West. Survive each level until the gun finally loads and destroys the floor!

WASD to move.

A project created for Fall Game Jam, 2022.

Credits:

Lukas Woodger - Artist

Ryan Woods - Sound Designer

Tina Allen - Programmer
